TASK_FIND_PROSPECTS.title: Find Prospects
TASK_FIND_PROSPECTS.instillShortDescription: Find prospects' contact information based on the company name you provide.
TASK_FIND_PROSPECTS.description: Find prospects' contact information based on the company name you provide. And, it will filter out the prospects who are not relevant to your search.

input.title: Input
input.description: Provide the information for which you want to find prospects.

company-name.title: Company Name
company-name.description: Provide the company name for which you want to find prospects.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Provide the number of prospects you want to find. If you don't provide any value, it will return 10 prospects. The maximum limit is 60. The minimum limit is 1.

filter-by.title: Filter By
filter-by.description: Provide the information about the prospects you want to filter. You can filter the prospects based on job title, name, and seniority. You can provide the regular expression for each field. When it matches, the prospect will be included in the output. If you don't provide any value, it will return all the prospects.

job-title.title: Job Title
job-title.description: Provide the job title of the prospects you want to find with [regular expression](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Regular_expressions).

seniority.title: Seniority
seniority.description: Provide the seniority of the prospects you want to find with [regular expression](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Regular_expressions).

order-by.title: Order By
order-by.description: Sort the prospects' info after getting the results based on company name. You can sort the prospects based on the job title and seniority. If you don't provide any value, it will return the prospects in the order they are found. If you provide both values, it will first sort the prospects based on the job title and then based on the seniority.

job-title.title: Job Title
job-title.description: Please provide the order in which you want to sort the prospects based on the job title.

seniority.title: Seniority
seniority.description: Please provide the order in which you want to sort the prospects based on the seniority.

output.title: Output
output.description: The output will be the list of prospects' contact information based on the company name you provide. It will include the name, job title, seniority, and email address of the prospects.

prospects.title: Prospects
prospects.description: The list of prospects' contact information based on the company name you provide.

job-title.title: Job Title
job-title.description: The job title of the prospect.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the prospect.

linkedin-url.title: LinkedIn URL
linkedin-url.description: The LinkedIn URL of the prospect.

company-description.title: Company Description
company-description.description: The description of the company from LeadIQ.
